list.name: Changes
list.comment:
TDN class updated, with print function variables ordered. unctions plot library updated, now can plot multiple while each scaled to min max, and all have window name taken as input. cleanDataNTime_MergeSync2DF.py added which merges 2 dataframe based on the excel tabs and merges the time, assuming clock time are correct, it matches the seconds together, it also has a function if data has seconds missing with 1 sec sample rate to get them +1 iterations increment on time so upon matching 60 sec resolution is achieved. AND print ordered neatly.
Corrolation plot added. All variables were renamed to remain consistent.
Beautified print. :)
230314 : - New plots added - plot 2 to 6 maxed. - Speed optimization - var & move_ave calculated only once, - New data added

task.summary: Just updated ReadMe. Fixed for Nan problem, and multi column.
Just updated ReadMe. Fixed for Nan problem, and multi column.
Variance method added for trendline identification. (Works like magic:) )
Beautiful plots added, unnecessary code remove.

New data added, code flexibility & scalability of plots. Functions updated.
